<class 'langchain_core.messages.tool.Too.content:
Here are some wedding venues in Paris that can accommodate 41 guests:

1. **Le Grand Domaine**: This venue can accommodate up to 41 guests and offers a stylish setting across its three properties. It is a great option for those looking to host a wedding in a beautiful and elegant environment. [Read more](https://chateaubeeselection.com/top-20-chateau-venues-for-a-large-wedding-in-france/)

2. **The Peninsula Paris**: Located in the heart of Paris, The Peninsula offers luxury and romance. It is one of the most sought-after venues for weddings in the city. [Read more](https://www.yvogreutert.com/post/wedding-venues-paris)

3. **The Westin Paris - Vendôme**: Situated between the Louvre and Place Vendôme, this venue offers stunning views over the Lake of Bois de Boulogne. It is perfect for couples looking for an intimate and elegant setting. [Read more](https://www.yvogreutert.com/post/wedding-venues-paris)

4. **Hôtel du Louvre**: This historic hotel is a unique and romantic venue for weddings, located in the heart of Paris. [Read more](https://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=Unique+Wedding+Venues&find_loc=Paris)

5. **Grand Palais**: Known for its beautiful interior illumination and grand setting, the Grand Palais is a unique place to celebrate a wedding in Paris. [Read more](https://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=Unique+Wedding+Venues&find_loc=Paris)

These venues offer a range of settings from luxurious to historic, ensuring that you can find the perfect place to celebrate your special day in Paris.
